description: ICS techniques mitigated by Validate Program Inputs, ATT&CK mitigation M0818 (v1.0)
name: Validate Program Inputs (M0818)

techniques.comment: Devices and programs should validate the content of any remote parameter changes, including those from HMIs, control servers, or engineering workstations.(Citation: PLCTop20 Mar 2023)
Devices and programs that receive command messages from remote systems (e.g., control servers) should verify those commands before taking any actions on them.
